item.title: Found your way home - R default library in windows
item.description: Reason about this post Many R learner (including myself) probably came across the default R library issues in windows system, especially when you are using a company laptop/PC. There are lots of discussion about changing the default directories in R on StackOverFlow and other websites. However, I found using Environment variables seems to be the easiest way to go. Change the default library via environment variables Windows key to trigger the start menu.
